about_the_game:
Affliction

The Archives DLC is a way to gain immediate access to all collectibles and lore items in the game! This includes personal notes, passages, diaries, journals, official documents, military orders, secret research notes, and more! This is also a way to show your continued support to Corrosive Studios! All files included in this DLC are in PNG format for easy viewing.
Archives DLC:
  • Digital Collectibles - All In Game Collectibles In One Place For Easy Access and Viewing!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Base game may run on systems with lower specs, but with poor performance
